title: Love a pathi neenga enna nenaikkareenga ??

comments.author: vijay03
comments.content: Verithanama Post da! Fraud's finally found a traffic spinner for his blog :P Raghuram's and Sivaguru's are gethu da! Spot on!

comments.author: Smrithi
comments.content: ayyo kadavule... hmmmmm nee enna theriyuma sollirupa.. "hmmm Manja podava paccha blouse neela kannadi valayal thala naraiiya poo ipdi enaku ethama mari contrast ah oru ponu paatha thaanda love varum illena ipdi aduthavangala kalaikara blog post than varum".. enna correct ah

comments.author: Smrithi
comments.content: hey frame a better equation for thanu love = fun fun not = Microsoft and MS No microsoft and MS = Waste of time therefore fun = waste of time love = waste of time ipdi ellam eqn pottu amaiyadhavanga gethu kamikalam

comments.author: Pradep
comments.content: Thanks Vijay. Fraud is going to earn a lot of money through Google Adsense . Treat Kettuduvom. And your answer for the question was very simple . I'll think something funny and put it under your name soon :P

comments.author: Pradep
comments.content: Smrithi, Adadada . Intha maari oru combinationa allava naan ithana naala thedittu irunthen... Aana ithu enga oor koil thiruvizhala Amman podra costume maari la irukku ... Seri , apdiye ipdi oru costume pottuttu vantha love varumnu nenaikkara ? Parithaabam thaan varum . Love varathukku endha maari costume pottirakkanum nu venumna adutha postla ezhudiduvom. \[:P\].

comments.author: Pradep
comments.content: He He . Thanu eqn poduvaan than. Aaan ipdi perusa podamaatan. Naan potta maari chinnadavum poda maatan. Pesaama avan kittaye inta kelviya kettu answera ingo pottiduvom . Athaan Bestu.

comments.content: @Pradep, Smrithi: Antha costume la ponna paatha love varuma? Parithabam varuma? Bayam thaan varum :P Kannu poidum :P So thiruvizhala irunthu thaan ching-cha va dress podriya da? Antha thiruvizhava ban pannanum :P
